detail_desc: Hat in a soft rib knit containing some mohair with an embroidered appliqué on the turned-up edge.
Long, sleeveless dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover and a seam at the waist with ties at one side. Unlined.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed cotton jersey.
Pre-tied bow tie in woven fabric with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 10 cm.
Large plastic hair claw. Width 9 cm.
V-neck blouse in a viscose crêpe weave in a relaxed fit with a gathered yoke at the back, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Tube top in ribbed cotton jersey with elastication around the top.
Sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with elastication around the neckline and waist. Flared skirt with loose panels to create a soft drape, and an asymmetric hem. Lined.
Longer-style, fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
Short, pleated skirt in a patterned weave with wide elastication at the waist. Unlined.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist with embroidered text inside the waistband, a zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow, cut-off, raw-edge hems.

Long, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with a wide flounced trim layered over the top that continues over the shoulders. Deep V-neck with beaded embroidery, shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Off-the-shoulder maxi dress in soft viscose jersey with a heavy drape. Short sleeves, elastication and a wide flounce at the top, an elasticated seam below the bust and gently flared skirt with high slits at the front. Unlined.
Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with press-studs on one shoulder and a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist and patch front pockets.
Sandals in scuba fabric with a print motif, heel straps with a hook and loop fastening and a loop at the back. Moulded ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
Jersey body in a soft cotton blend with a V-neck and decorative gathers at the bust, narrow shoulder straps and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Knee-length dress in heavily draping jersey crêpe with a V-neck, cap sleeves and a wrapover front with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined front.
Imitation suede trainers with a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a discreet loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a sweetheart neckline and short puff sleeves with covered elastication at the hems. Detachable fabric belt with a covered metal buckle, and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist.
Short, wide pyjama top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Short top with a small stand-up collar, a deep opening at the front, an opening at the back with press-studs at the back of the neck, and long sleeves.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck top in an airy cotton weave with embroidery. Narrow shoulder straps and pompom trims at the top and down the front.
Sleeveless top in a gently draping viscose weave with short, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck.

Fitted one-shoulder dress in sturdy, glossy jersey with one narrow, tie-top shoulder strap and one wide shoulder strap. Drawstring at one side to create a draped effect and an asymmetric hem with a high slit in one side. Partly lined.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with mesh sections. Mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and full coverage at the back.
Pyjama bottoms in an airy cotton weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly and side pockets.
Mesh washing bags in different colours with a zip.
Striped top in soft terry with a lined hood, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and slits in the sides.
Small weekend bag in woven fabric with a zip and two handles at the top, an adjustable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 12x35x42 cm.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch fabric with a zip fly, press-studs at the waist, zipped pockets and straight legs.
Top in jersey crêpe with a lace yoke, round neckline, cut-out section at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Trousers in soft, patterned jersey with wide, elasticated smocking at the waist for a more comfortable fit. Side pockets, a low crotch and wide, tapered legs.
Knee-length, 5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.

Dress with a matching hairband in soft organic cotton. Sleeveless dress with buttons on the shoulders and sewn-in puff pants with elasticated hems and press-studs at the crotch. Hairband with a sewn-in bow at the front and elastication at the back of the neck.

Blouse in a patterned cotton weave containing glittery threads with a grandad collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with a small opening and button at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum.
Top in ribbed jersey with a supersoft, brushed finish. Round neckline, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Slits in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Shorts with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and a straight-cut hem.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and zipped side pockets. Reflective details and tapered legs with a zip at the hems.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a concealed button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit – a modern fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and wrapover front with a visible button at one side and concealed ties at the other. Long sleeves and wide, buttoned cuffs. Lined at the top.

Calf-length dress in lightly crinkled jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves with narrow elastication at the ends and an elasticated seam at the waist. Decorative buttons at the top and classic buttons on the skirt. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shirt in softly draping matt silk with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Round-necked T-shirt in a soft cotton blend. The T-shirt incorporates COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
Blouse in an airy, patterned cotton weave with elastication around the top and short, flounced, raglan sleeves.
Short, wide shorts in a viscose weave with a high, elasticated, frill-trimmed waist and side pockets.
Court shoes with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 10.5 cm.
Wide, high-waisted shorts woven in a cotton blend with wide elastication and a frill trim at the top.
Short, tiered skirt in an airy cotton weave. Regular waist with wide smocking.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with an extra-high waist. Slightly looser fit with straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Baby Exclusive. Fine-knit set in a soft silk and cotton blend. Long-sleeved jumper with buttons at the top and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist and roll-edge hems.
Long-sleeved blouse in a patterned, textured weave with an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
TOCA LIFE x H&M. Small, thickly padded shoulder bag in soft pile with appliqués and embroidery. Zip at the back and a detachable shoulder strap made from twisted cord. Lined. Size approx. 20x28 cm.

Shirt woven in a stretch viscose blend with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Yoke and darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist to create a fitted silhouette.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a shaft that finishes at the knee.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.

Satin blouse with a stand-up collar, decorative gathers at the top and an opening with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, wide cuffs with a covered button, and a gently rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Top in jersey made from a cotton blend. Lined hood with a wrapover front, ribbed side panels and a kangaroo pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slim Fit.
Top in soft cotton jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck, and long raglan sleeves with a puff and narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports bra with an elasticated hem. Narrow shoulder straps and decorative straps at the back.
Soft, transparent silicone smartphone case. Fits iPhone 6/7.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, front and back pockets and skinny legs.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with inset lace trims, elastication at the top and hem, and short sleeves with a flounced trim.
Trousers in a woven fabric with a regular waist, fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets, fake pockets and tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight hems.
Jumper in textured-knit cotton with a slightly wider neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Patterned swimsuit with a small stand-up collar, zip with a chin guard at the front, 3/4-length sleeves and short legs. Lined. UPF 50.

Small leather wallet with an outer compartment, a note compartment and six card slots. This product has been made in Sweden using remnants of Italian leather that have been repurposed and given a new lease of life. Height 8 cm. Width 10 cm.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a wide neckline, motif on the front and cut-out sections on the shoulders. Longer and rounded at the back.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Sports top in soft, fast-drying, functional fabric with short cap sleeves and a longer inner top with a racer back.
